lu_part1: Wann ee bis den Zock huet,
lu_part2: da geet et bal vum selwen.
en_literal_translation_p1: When one has reached the end,
en_literal_translation_p2: then it almost goes by itself.
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p1: Once you get the hang of it,
en_closest_real_corresponding_saying_p2: things start to fall into place.
